alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:23PM CDT until June 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Elmore County in east central Alabama... Montgomery County in south central Alabama... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Coosada to Lowndes County Airport, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Prattville, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Meadville, Pike Road, Coosada, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Auburn University In Montgomery, Dublin, Woodcrest, Snowdoun, Sellers, Ramer, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Hunter, Alabama State University, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium and Blue Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
